name: GearGrit
storyline:
GearGrit takes place in a galaxy not unlike our own, cars, corporations, tyrannical governments, and so on.
You play as Tansy GearGrit, whom was at the wrong place at the wrong time. Overheard a government plot to "Leave the planet behind along with its Trash."

Tansy is a wanted fugitive who's trying to single-handedly start a rebelling against her rules, and make their plans known!
summary: Tansy Geargrit, charged with some crimes she did commit, and some she didn't... Explore, platform, and blast your way through GearGrit, an Action Platformer inspired by your favorite PS2 games!
